trends: There has been one other sighting in North Ogden
There were no other sightings in North Ogden on or around November 18th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at work. I looked put my window figuring what to do next on my list of to dos. And as soon as I looked out I saw what looked like a round super shiny ball flying up a creves near Ben Lomond peak here on ogden. It last just seconds and dissapeard. I searched for it after losing sight. But was too hard to find because of the recent snow. I can't explain what I saw. Most definitely unexplained flying object. I was in the valley below in north Ogden and o saw whatever it was north east of my window.
